item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

07/18/2011 location - 116 Crown

They're opening just for us (normally closed Mondays in the summer), come see their glowing bar and hidden caves.

The New Haven Advocate Reader's poll voted it best place for martinis, and best place for specialty cocktails.

Happy hour specials:

They'll offer a special menu of cocktails that are all 20% off

They'll be some sort of complimentary nibbles.

However there won't be kitchen staff, so you won't be able to order a meal. So eat before, if you care (hah, or have a pizza delivered!).

Your contact/host is Jason, call or texting is fine (my # is in my RSVP). 

Please RSVP for this event to give them an accurate heads up.

For Happy Hour Events if you're only a Maybe please put this in your comment.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: Everyone in it will be NHC
item.name: Mon. 7/18 - Happy Hour: *Opening just for us!* 116 Crown
